overview.en: A leading DeFi lending platform based on The LPOA Protocol, LPOA is committed to providing decentralized lending services for crypto asset enthusiasts around the world. It supports a majority of popular assets in the world.
overview.zh: LPOA基于智能合约和自动化算法技术，支持ETH、TRON、Heco、Bsc，用户可以存币获得利息，抵押借币支付利息。LPOA的利率由市场供需决定，资产由用户掌握，在全球支持随存随取、随借随还。
